name: Atropine & Pralidoxime
indications: Exposure to organophosphorus nerve agents and pesticides
contraindications: None in the presence of life-threatening organophosphorus poisoning
side_effects: Signs of atropinization may occur earlier when both drugs given together

pedi: < 8 YoA {Autoinjector} x1 each 2mg Atropine (combined with 600mg Pralidoxime) [TE8]
8-14 YoA {Autoinjector} x2 each 2mg Atropine (combined with 600mg Pralidoxime) [TE8]
adult: > 15 YoA {Autoinjector} x3 each 2mg Atropine (combined with 600mg Pralidoxime) [TE8]
